definition: Turkmenistan/Republic of Turkmenistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Iran
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Statue of the Turkmenbashi, President Niyazov.
sentences.chinese: 尊称为“土库曼巴什”的尼亚佐夫总统的雕像。

sentences.english: Its closest relatives are Turkish and Turkmen.
sentences.chinese: 与它最接近的是土耳其语和土库曼语。
土库曼人向来是游牧民族。

sentences.english: The Republic of Turkmenistan disjointed from USSR.
sentences.chinese: 土库曼加盟共和国脱离了苏联。

sentences.english: When adorned with national Turkmenian silver decorations, gray horses look stunning.
sentences.chinese: 当装饰品装饰与国家土库曼斯坦银，灰马，令人炫目。

sentences.english: Turkmenistan's capital, Ashkhabad, primarily serves as a government center.
sentences.chinese: 阿什哈巴德，土库曼斯坦首都，也是该国政治中心。

sentences.english: Turkmenian herdsmen keep watch on the breed.
sentences.chinese: 土库曼斯坦牧民继续照顾着这个品种。

sentences.english: The Turkoman runs with its tail streaming behind.
sentences.chinese: 土库曼运行它的尾巴流背后。
经过认证，土库曼斯坦迈入了没有疟疾行列。

sentences.english: Turkmenistan recently becomes the focus of the competition between EU-Russia energy strategies.
sentences.chinese: 土库曼斯坦是欧俄能源战略争夺的焦点。

sentences.english: Today, 50 percent of the land that can be used for farming in Turkmenistan is planted with cotton.
sentences.chinese: 目前土库曼有五成的农业用地种植棉花。

sentences.english: Turkmenistan's shackling is typical of broader failure in the region.
sentences.chinese: 土库曼斯坦的闭关锁国是这个区域更大的失败。

sentences.english: The Akhal–Tekes come from the Kara–Kum Desert in Turkmenia.
sentences.chinese: 在阿哈尔，特克斯从卡拉来，琴在土库曼沙漠。

sentences.english: The gas of Turkmenistan is distributed mainly in the Karakum basin.
sentences.chinese: 土库曼的天然气主要分布于卡拉库姆盆地。

sentences.english: Morocco and Turkmenistan were declared malaria-free in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 2010年，摩洛哥和土库曼斯坦被宣布为无疟疾国。

sentences.english: Turkmens were the first desert people to produce a horse ideal for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 土库曼斯坦是第一个沙漠的人产生对环境的马理想。

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3

definition: the Ferghana valley (in Uzbekistan, central Asia)
Tajik ethnic group/Tajikistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Xinjiang and Afghanistan
Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
the Ural mountains in Russia, dividing Europe from Asia
